description: Sum of [tau^(n-k)] for k from 1 to infinity.
references: C. Kimberling, Problem 10520 in Amer. Math. Mon. 103 (1996) p. 347.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,1,-3,0,1).
prog: (Python)prpr = 0prev = 1for n in range(2,100):    print prev,    curr = prpr+prev + n//2    prpr = prev    prev = curr# From _Alex Ratushnyak_, Jul 30 2012
author: _Clark Kimberling_
